title: Watershed
description: Love Where You Roam, #1  She left home to find herself. . .and found love along the way.  Maggie isn't looking for love on her backpacking trip through Australia. She's got enough man troubles back in Ireland. Australia is her escape, a place of adventure where she can create memories to last a lifetime.  But some memories won't be left behind.  Gray is ready to quit hiring backpackers to help with the work on his remote Queensland cattle station when Maggie turns up. She's just passing through, but the connection they forge during the long nights herding cattle won't be so easily cast aside.  CONTENT A strong-willed Irish heroine, a stubborn Australian hero, and oceans of difference to bridge for love.44,167 Words
author: C.D. Brennan
